Trade/Device Name(s): Kurin Blood Culture Collection Set with Kurin Lock Technology
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Kurin Blood Culture Collection Set with Kurin Lock Technology to collect blood samples and reduce blood culture contamination rates via specimen diversion.
Indications for Use Summary: Intended to obtain blood samples via venipuncture or Peripheral IV access for blood cultures, using a diversion channel to reduce contamination; pressure-rated extension set allows use for infusion of fluids, medications, blood, and blood products, including with power injectors up to 325 psi.
